label: 横井松陰
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: よこい しょうなん
説明文: (1809-69). Also: Heishiro. Younger son of Kumamoto hirazamurai (150 koku). Through influence of Hashimoto Sanai, invited to act as adviser to Matsudaira Shungaku of Echizen. Advocated kobu-gattai and reform of Bakufu system. Strong influence on ideas of anti-Bakufu groups. Councillor (Sanyo) in early Meiji government.
